Segment.name: BVA
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of the Vehicle Application Advice Transaction Set

Field.name: PaymentTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of payment information

Field.name: StandardCarrierAlphaCode
Field.comment: Standard Carrier Alpha Code

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier1
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: InvoiceNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number assigned by issuer

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier2
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: VehicleServiceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying service performed on an in-transit motor vehicle

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier3
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode3
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

Field.name: LadingDescriptionQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of lading description

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date3
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: CheckNumber
Field.comment: Check identification number

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: EquipmentDescriptionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

Field.name: Quantity
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: ShipmentIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the shipper that uniquely identifies the shipment from origin to ultimate destination and is not subject to modification; (Does not contain blanks or special characters)

Field.name: FlightVoyageNumber
Field.comment: Identifying designator for the particular flight or voyage on which the cargo travels

Field.name: VehicleStatus
Field.comment: In-transit status of a motor vehicle

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set
